column4: Hi friends.. I'm getting trouble with ATI RADEON 4200 (onboard) in ubuntu 8.04. I can only set as maximum resolution, 800x600. Can anyone help?
is your card running at all? ever since updating to ubuntu 10.04 my ATI RADEON card has not been able to run at all
is the ATI driver installed at all? ever since i updated to ubuntu 10.04, fglrx has been broken
